title: Bandit (Pollnivneach)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Pollnivnian Bandits are located in northern Pollnivneach in between the general store and the rug merchant. They are the fastest Thieving experience at level 45 Thieving. Unbearded Pollnivnian Bandits are also the fastest Thieving experience at 55 Thieving. The best way to distinguish them from one another is by their combat level and beards. Bearded bandits are level 41 combat and wield blackjacks, whereas unbearded bandits are level 56 combat and wield steel scimitars. Level 41 bearded Pollnivnian bandits grant 65 experience and 40 coins per pickpocket. Level 56 unbearded Pollnivnian bandits grant 84.3 experience and 50 coins per pickpocket.

Pollnivnian Bandits are located in northern Pollnivneach in between the general store and the rug merchant. They are the fastest Thieving experience at level 45 Thieving. Unbearded Pollnivnian Bandits are also the fastest Thieving experience at 55 Thieving. The best way to distinguish them from one another is by their combat level and beards. Bearded bandits are level 41 combat and wield blackjacks, whereas unbearded bandits are level 56 combat and wield steel scimitars. Level 41 bearded Pollnivnian bandits grant 65 experience and 40 coins per pickpocket. Level 56 unbearded Pollnivnian bandits grant 84.3 experience and 50 coins per pickpocket.

The options you can use on Pollnivnean Bandits are Talk-To, Pickpocket, Lure, and Knock-Out. Lure, Pickpocket and Knock-Out are the options used in a Thieving method known as blackjacking. Blackjacking is the fastest Thieving experience from level 45 to 91 Thieving.

In order to get the maximum experience rates, one must make it about 4/5 into the quest The Feud, which has a requirement of 30 Thieving and the ability to kill a level 70 bandit. However, this quest is easily completable using Fire Strike behind the camel pen to kill the bandit at the end of the quest. Blackjacks have no requirements to use other than 30 Thieving.
